description: This file provides a singleton pattern implementation for creating and retrieving a configured Supabase client instance, ensuring only one instance exists throughout the application lifecycle. It also validates environment variables and throws user-friendly errors if necessary configurations are missing.

methods.name: getSupabaseClient()
methods.description: Returns a singleton instance of the Supabase client, creating it if it does not already exist. It reads configuration from environment variables and ensures required values are present, throwing an error if not.
